title: Mexico City Metropolitcan Cathedral

___________________

      Mexico City
Metropolitan Cathedral

___________________

wheream_i




The Mexico City
cathedral is one of
the oldest in the
Americas, with
construction beginning
in 1573.

It was built on the
ruins of a sacred
Aztec precinct near
the Templo Mayor. The
original building was
built using stones
from the ruins of
temples dedicated to
the gods Quetzalcoatl
and Huitzilopochtli.
